quote: I'm square. My sense of right and wrong makes it very difficult for me to have an affair. I have to be really in love in order to sleep with a man and when I'm really in love I want to be married.
quote_letters: IM SQUARE MY SENSE OF RIGHT AND WRONG MAKES IT VERY DIFFICULT FOR ME TO HAVE AN AFFAIR I HAVE TO BE REALLY IN LOVE IN ORDER TO SLEEP WITH A MAN AND WHEN IM REALLY IN LOVE I WANT TO BE MARRIED
